title: About Me
description: As a recent Mechanical Engineering graduate, I bring a strong foundation in CAD design and technical drafting. My academic journey and internship experiences have equipped me with hands-on expertise in creating detailed 2D drawings and sophisticated 3D models for various mechanical components and assemblies.

I'm proficient in industry-standard CAD software including AutoCAD, SolidWorks, and CATIA. My skill set extends to GD&T (Geometric Dimensioning and Tolerancing), sheet metal design, and assembly modeling. I'm committed to delivering accurate, manufacturable designs that meet engineering specifications and quality standards.

highlights.title: Precision Focused
highlights.description: Meticulous attention to detail in dimensions, tolerances, and specifications

highlights.title: Multi-disciplinary
highlights.description: Experience across mechanical, structural, and industrial design projects

highlights.title: Fast Learner
highlights.description: Quick adaptation to new software, tools, and industry standards

highlights.description: Focused on delivering accurate, manufacturable designs on time

highlights.title: Time Management

highlights.title: Team Player
